content.raw:
Hello,

after announcement on community forum I wanted to test our latest `ver59` with `ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1` also on new Simple Cave worlds \(which are now available on CloudSim\). It was supposed to be 5min exploration and it is taking already 8 hours, i.e. it is probably wrong? In the output I see:

```
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:447] Could not resolve file [simple_cave_01.sdf]
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboServer] File[libignition-launch-gazebo.so]
[Msg] Recording to [/tmp/ign/logs]
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[].
Error [parser.cc:670] Could not find model.config or manifest.xml for the model
Error [parser.cc:340] File [] doesn't exist.
[Err] [Server.cc:144] Error Code 1 Msg: Unable to read file:
[Dbg] [GazeboServer.cc:205] Loaded GazeboServer plugin.
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[subt::CommsBrokerPlugin] File[libCommsBrokerPlugin.so]
[Dbg] [CommsBrokerPlugin.cc:66] Loading visibility_config from SDF:
RF Configuration (visibility-based)
-- visibilityCostToFadingExponent: 0.2
Unable to read [/home/developer/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/simple_cave_01.dot] file
[Err] [VisibilityTable.cc:87] Unable to populate visibility graph using path[/home/developer/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/simple_cave_01.dot]
[Err] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:36] Unable to load visibility table data files
-- commsCostMax: 10
```

which does not look good :disappointed: 

Does it mean CloudSim is not updated yet, or we have to rebuild our controller??

thanks

   Martin/Robotika Team
content.html:
Hello,

after announcement on community forum I wanted to test our latest ver59 with ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 also on new Simple Cave worlds (which are now available on CloudSim). It was supposed to be 5min exploration and it is taking already 8 hours, i.e. it is probably wrong? In the output I see:

[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:447] Could not resolve file [simple_cave_01.sdf]
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboServer] File[libignition-launch-gazebo.so]
[Msg] Recording to [/tmp/ign/logs]
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[].
Error [parser.cc:670] Could not find model.config or manifest.xml for the model
Error [parser.cc:340] File [] doesn't exist.
[Err] [Server.cc:144] Error Code 1 Msg: Unable to read file:
[Dbg] [GazeboServer.cc:205] Loaded GazeboServer plugin.
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[subt::CommsBrokerPlugin] File[libCommsBrokerPlugin.so]
[Dbg] [CommsBrokerPlugin.cc:66] Loading visibility_config from SDF:
RF Configuration (visibility-based)
-- visibilityCostToFadingExponent: 0.2
Unable to read [/home/developer/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/simple_cave_01.dot] file
[Err] [VisibilityTable.cc:87] Unable to populate visibility graph using path[/home/developer/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/simple_cave_01.dot]
[Err] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:36] Unable to load visibility table data files
-- commsCostMax: 10

which does not look good

Does it mean CloudSim is not updated yet, or we have to rebuild our controller??

thanks

Martin/Robotika Team
